SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
App
App Class as main application class contains the main function and is used to run the software.
Button
Creates the Button class which inherits JButton to better customise buttons in the User Interface.
Connection
Represents a directed connection between two lanes in the network.
Constants
Defines fixed values for file paths and drawing properties to ensure consistency when plotting maps and running programs.
ControlPanel
Deprecated.
Custom ControlPanel class that inherits Panel.
Dropdown<E>
Implements the Dropdown component on the UI.
Edge
Creates Edge class (may includes Edge in the future).
FilterPanel
A panel for filtering vehicles.
Frame
Custom Frame class that inherits JFrame.
GraphicsSettings
The Class GraphicsSettings which saves the configurations of Graphics2D
InjectPanel
A panel for injecting vehicles.
InspectPanel
A UI panel used for inspecting vehicles.
Junction
Creates Junction class (may includes Junction in the future).
Label
Configures a label on the UI.
Lane
Creates Lane class (may includes Lane in the future).
MapPanel
Custom MapPanel class that inherits Panel.
MapViewPanel
A UI panel used for adjusting the map view.
Network
Loads and stores all information related to the network from SUMO.
NetworkXMLReader
Creates class NetworkXMLReader that inherits XMLReader used to parse network components such as Edge and Junction.
Panel
Custom Panel class that inherits JPanel.
Phase
Creates Phase class for TrafficLight.
Point
Create 2-dimensional coordinates to better represent object classes such as Lane & Junction.
ProgramLightsPanel
A UI panel used for controlling the Lights.
Route
Creates Route class (may include Route in the future).
RouteXMLReader
Creates class RouteXMLReader that inherits XMLReader used to parse route components such as Route and VehicleType.
Settings
Loads and stores all network and route information, initializes and updates changes to simulation configuations.
SimulationConfig
Holds configuration parameters that control how the simulation is displayed and executed.
StatisticsPanel
A UI panel used for displaying simulation statistics.
SumoConnectionManager
Creates SumoConnectionManager class used to establish the connection between Java programs and SUMO via TraCI.
TabbedPane
A custom Tabbed Pane with tabs placed on the left side and scrollable tab layout.
TextBox
Custom TextBox class that inherits JTextField.
TextBox.SettingsType
The Enum SettingsType.
TrafficLight
Creates TrafficLight class.
TrafficLightController
Wrapper Class for Trafficlight.
Vehicle
Creates Vehicle class.
VehicleController
Wrapper Class for Vehicle.
VehicleType
Creates Vehicle Type class.
XMLReader
Creates XMLReader used to read and parse XML files.
